sourcesContent:
Sample Stocks

Title Symbol Current Price Past Price Time Stamp
{{stock.title}} {{stock.symbol}} {{stock.currentPrice}} {{stock.PriceHistory.price}} {{stock.PriceHistory.timeStamp}}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; @Component({ selector: 'app-stocks', templateUrl: './stocks.component.html', styleUrls: ['./stocks.component.css'] }) export class StocksComponent implements OnInit { stocks: StocksDetails[]; constructor(private http: HttpClient) { this.stocks = []; } ngOnInit() { this.getStocks(); } getStocks() { this.http.get('http://localhost:7272/stocks').subscribe(data => { this.stocks = data; }); } } export interface StocksDetails { title: string, symbol: string, currentPrice: number, pastPrice: PriceHistory } export interface PriceHistory { price: number, timeStamp: string }
